AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Worker droid
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a colony crafted Droid. Made for manual labor these workers are great for toiling around the colony.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Battle droid
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a colony crafted Battle droid. Made for battle these droids do not do much else beside fighting and hauling.
